Lines.Comment: Responding to: "Are you ready? I tire of waiting."
Responding to: "Well, this oughta be fun."
Responding to: "Think you can keep up with me, big feller?"
Responding to: "Look who it is. This oughta be interesting."
Responding to: "We fight together for honor, terran."
Responding to: "Nice to see somebody I can trust around here." or "You look like a tough one. Let's win this thing together! "
Responding to: "Terrans. I despise you almost as much I as despise myself."
Responding to: "Are you readied for the battle ahead?"
Responding to: "The terrans? Oh, were there no viable allies?" (AlarakBase_IntroQuestion_Terran00)
Responding to: "I hope you're ready, friend." (JainaBase_IntroQuestion01)
Responding to: "YOU THINK YOU HAVE MASTERY OVER FIRE? (Laughs)" (RagnarosBase_IntroQuestion_FireUser00) or "Interesting. You could make for a powerful ally". (KaelthasBase_IntroQuestion_Positive00)
